Package C2G8_Project

Class ElevatorSubsystem

java.lang.Object
C2G8_Project.ElevatorSubsystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
DispatchConsumer, Runnable
public class ElevatorSubsystem extends Object implements Runnable, DispatchConsumer
Author:
JP ElevatorSubsystem is a state driven elevator, that sends its information to the scheduler each time a state is changed or a new floor is reached. The states only change by the Scheduler's command unless the Elevator is changing its state due to the Error States handling

  • Constructor Details

    • ElevatorSubsystem

      public ElevatorSubsystem(int id, int location, Dispatcher dispatch, ElevatorSystem boundSystem)
      Parameters:
      id - Unique Identifier for each elevator
      location - Current Floor Location of elevator
      dispatch - Dispatcher used to send/receive messages from scheduler
      boundSystem - Parent ElevatorSubsystem Parent

      public void run()

      run in interface Runnable

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()

    • getShutdown

      public boolean getShutdown()

    • processNextSignal

      public void processNextSignal()
      Handles the state transition of the elevator. All States except START an*d MOVING_UP/DOWN are only sent once with the help of stateSent boolean Once a state has been processed, the ElevatorSignal containing the state is sent to the scheduler

    • handleNewFloorRequests

      public void handleNewFloorRequests()
      In state Close_Doors the elevator receives the In-Elevator buttons pressed This method removes any buttons currently already pressed and informs the Scheduleer of In-Elevator buttons pressed that must be registered

    • extractNextSignal

      public ElevatorSignal extractNextSignal()
      Extracts Signal from Queue when available and updates elevator information
      Returns:
      ElevatorSignal

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage()
      Sends Elevator Signal to Scheduler and clears any In-Elevator buttons pressed

    • receiveDispatch

      public void receiveDispatch(String topic, String data)
      Receive data from dispatcher and add it to Queue if it's an elevator_signal topic, or send the shutdown signal if its a Scenario_end topic
      Specified by:
      receiveDispatch in interface DispatchConsumer
      Parameters:
      topic - The topic under which the data was received
      data - The data contained within the message in JSON format
